description:
Currently os-services:update operation is requested against v3/os-services/{enable, disable} that is not the right approach and was one of the things to be fixed on the v3 plans.

The right way to do it is showing the service id when listing services and using that id to create a resquest to enable/disable it against v3/os-services/{id} with a body describing the action to be performed.
title: Nova os-services:update should be requested by service id to respect REST principles

comments.content:
Currently os-services:update operation is requested against v3/os-services/{enable, disable} that is not the right approach and was one of the things to be fixed on the v3 plans.

The right way to do it is showing the service id when listing services and using that id to create a resquest to enable/disable it against v3/os-services/{id} with a body describing the action to be performed.
